value.title: Create allocation table and visualize it in a Gantt Charts with matrix in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how you can create an allocation table in Power query and display the results in a Gantt chart using only the Matrix available in Power BI.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI!
